channel.title: Portfolio on cestduLeon/
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on cestduLeon/
channel.copyright: How's your thirst for adventure, Captain?

item.title: Soaring High: Redesigning 872 RCACS Website
item.description: From Classroom to Cloud: Crafting a Digital Home for 872 RCACS

item.title: BOOKMARK, the landing page of a extension
item.description: This is a landing page with a extensions called bookmark. Page implementation with Tailwind

item.title: Foodie, a food delivery app
item.description: Foodie makes your food ordering process enjoyable. Don’t know what to eat? Come and get a hint from our community curated recommendations and food matches!

item.title: Pitch Jams, a website to crowdfund your ideas
item.description: It was a hackathon project to turn an employer’s idea into a prototype web page in 2 days. Our 4-member student team won the first place in the program and $1000 in prize money.

item.title: Flow Mstery, a website to help users with Pomodoro Technique
item.description: This is a website to help users to learn or work with Pomodoro Technique. Includes a complete visual design and a complete web project realized in Javascript.

item.title: Shiba Inu Samurai, a logo for Apple devices
item.description: An app icon inspired by Shiba Inu and Knight Rider
